note: Foremost, I am a blessed father of five terrific human beings, a husband who admittedly out-kicked his coverage, and a fellow citizen of this blue marble we call Earth. As a retired USMC veteran, I also passionately advocate for the veteran community. During my free time, I can be found cheering for the Michigan Wolverines and being a generic badass in the virtual world of Elder Scrolls Online. Opinions are mine and do not represent anyone else who may apologetically claim to know me.
